name: Bessie
description: Bessie is a friendly cow who loves to graze in the green pastures.

name: Dolly
description: Dolly is a fluffy sheep who enjoys following her flock and exploring the meadows.

name: Cluck
description: Cluck is a curious chicken who loves scratching the ground for tasty treats.

name: Porky
description: Porky is a playful pig who enjoys rolling around in the mud and snorting with delight.

name: Maggie
description: Maggie is a gentle cow who loves being brushed and enjoys long walks in the field.

name: Bo
description: Bo is a mischievous sheep who often jumps and leaps, making everyone laugh.

name: Nugget
description: Nugget is a friendly chicken who provides the freshest eggs each morning.

name: Wilbur
description: Wilbur is an intelligent pig who enjoys engaging in games and tricks.

name: Bella
description: Bella is a motherly cow who takes care of the younger calves with love and patience.

name: Fluffy
description: Fluffy is a gentle and cuddly sheep who enjoys being petted and loves attention.

name: Wings
description: Wings is a brave and adventurous chicken who loves to explore new areas of the farm.

name: Babe
description: Babe is a playful piglet who is always full of energy and loves to run and jump around.

name: Moo
description: Moo is a curious and gentle cow who loves to interact with visitors and be hand-fed grass.

name: Fleece
description: Fleece is a majestic sheep with a beautiful wool coat that keeps her warm during winter.

name: Feathers
description: Feathers is a graceful chicken who enjoys taking short flights around the farm.

name: Piglet
description: Piglet is a friendly and gentle pig who loves belly rubs and playing with squeaky toys.
